name: irish-democratic-accountability-dashboard
description: Complete Political Transparency Platform Exposing TD Property Ownership & Financial Inequality

scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run verify
scripts.build: echo 'Static site - no build required' && npm run test
scripts.security: npm run audit && npm run verify
scripts.accessibility: pa11y http://localhost:8080 --standard WCAG2AA || echo 'Install pa11y: npm install -g @pa11y/cli'
scripts.lighthouse: lhci autorun --collect.url=http://localhost:8080 || echo 'Install lighthouse: npm install -g @lhci/cli'
scripts.update:td-data: echo 'Please update complete-td-database.json manually from official Oireachtas sources'
scripts.update:property-data: echo 'Please update data/property-data.json from Register of Members Interests'
scripts.verify:data: npm run validate && npm run verify && echo 'Data verification complete'
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting JSON files...' && find . -name '*.json' -not -path './node_modules/*' -exec sh -c 'python -m json.tool "$1" > "$1.tmp" && mv "$1.tmp" "$1"' _ {} \;
scripts.check:links: echo 'Checking for broken links...' && grep -r 'href=' *.html || true
scripts.minify: echo 'Minifying CSS and JS for production...' && npx terser *.js --compress --mangle -o dist/app.min.js && npx cssnano *.css --output dist/styles.min.css
scripts.stats: echo 'Project Statistics:' && echo 'HTML files:' && find . -name '*.html' | wc -l && echo 'JS files:' && find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' | wc -l && echo 'JSON files:' && find . -name '*.json' -not -path './node_modules/*' | wc -l

project.name: Irish Democratic Accountability Dashboard
project.description: Exposing systematic wealth extraction by political representatives
project.legal_basis: Ethics in Public Office Act 1995, transparency laws

features.td_finance_calculator: Compare income between workers and TDs

impact.democratic_value: Exposes conflicts of interest in housing policy
impact.transparency_impact: Public access to TD property information
